1.featuretextwithbullet:
Magical Tinkering: You may imbue a number of Tiny nonmagical objects (up to your Int modifier) as an action with one of the following magical properties. You can end the effect as an action.
   - The object sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light for an additional 5 feet
   - You utter a message (up to 6 seconds long) that can be heard up to 10 feet away whenever the object is tapped by a creature
   - The object continuously emits your choice of an odor or a nonverbal sound perceivable up to 10 feet away
   - A static visual effect appears on one of the object's surfaces. This effect can be a picture, up to 25 words of text, lines and shapes, or a mixture of these elements
Spellcasting: You gain the ability to cast spells. Your spell ability modifier is Intelligence. You can use an arcane focus for your Artificer spells.

2.featuretextwithbullet: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 3 infusions known, and can infuse up to 2 items during a long rest.

3.featuretextwithbullet: Tool Proficiency: Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make with a tool.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 4 infusions known, and can infuse up to 2 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 3 infusions known, and can infuse up to 2 items during a long rest.

5.featuretextwithbullet: Arcane Armament: You can attack twice whenever you take the Attack action on your turn, but one of the attacks must be made with a magic weapon.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 4 infusions known, and can infuse up to 3 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 4 infusions known, and can infuse up to 2 items during a long rest.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 5 infusions known, and can infuse up to 3 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 4 infusions known, and can infuse up to 3 items during a long rest.

10.featuretextwithbullet: The Right Cantrip for the Job: Whenever you finish a short or long rest, you can replace one of the artificer cantrips you know with another cantrip from the artificer spell list.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 6 infusions known, and can infuse up to 4 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 5 infusions known, and can infuse up to 3 items during a long rest.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 7 infusions known, and can infuse up to 4 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 6 infusions known, and can infuse up to 4 items during a long rest.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 7 infusions known, and can infuse up to 5 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 7 infusions known, and can infuse up to 4 items during a long rest.

18.featuretextwithbullet: Spell-Storing Item: After a long rest, you can touch one weapon or spellcasting focus and store a spell in it. It must be a 1st-or 2nd-level artificer spell that requires 1 action to cast. While holding the object, a creature can take an action to produce the spell's effect from it using your spellcasting ability modifier. The spell stays in the object until it has been used a number of times equal to twice your Intelligence modifier (minimum of twice) or until you use this feature again.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 8 infusions known, and can infuse up to 5 items during a long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Infuse Item: You gain the ability to imbue mundane items with magical infusions. You currently have 7 infusions known, and can infuse up to 5 items during a long rest.

20.featuretextwithbullet: Soul of Artifice: You can attune to up to six magic items at once. In addition, you gain a +1 bonus to all saving throws per magic item you are currently attuned to.

archetypes.name: Alchemist
archetypes.previewtext: Expert at combining exotic reagents to produce a variety of materials including potions, alchemist's fire, and other useful items.

3.featuretextwithbullet: Tools of the Trade: You gain profiency with alchemist's supplies and the herbalism kit, and aquire them for free. Also, crafting a magic item in the potion category takes a quarter of the normal time and costs half as much of the usual gold.
Alchemical Homunculus: You learn ancient methods for magically creating a special homunculus that is formed by alchemical substances. See the rulebook for details.

6.featuretextwithbullet: Alchemical Mastery: When you cast a spell using your alchemist's supplies as the spellcasting focus, you gain a bonus equal to your Intelligence modifier to one roll that restores hit points or deals acid or poison damage. You can cast lesser restoration without expending a spell slot a number of times per day equal to your Intelligence modifier

14.featuretextwithbullet: Chemical Savant: You gain resistance to acid damage and poison damage, and immunity to being poisoned. Once per long rest you can cast greater restoration without expending a spell slot and without providing the material component.

archetypes.name: Archivist
archetypes.previewtext: Masters of storing knowledge and creating artificial intelligences fueled by magic.

3.featuretextwithbullet: Tools of the Trade: You gain profiency with calligrapher's supplies and the forgery kit, and aquire them for free. Also, crafting a magic item in the scroll category takes a quarter of the normal time and costs half as much of the usual gold.
Artificial Mind: You discover how to awaken an artificial mind inside an object. See the rulebook for details.

6.featuretextwithbullet: Mind Network: You can communicate two-ways telepathically with anyone carring an item that you've infused. Also, you add your intelligence modifier to psychic damage rolls

14.featuretextwithbullet: Pure Information: When you expend a spell slot to increase the damage of Information Overload, the target must succeed on an Intelligence saving throw against your spell save DC or be stunned until the end of your next turn. Also, As an action you can cause your Artificial Mind to teleport you the spectral mind or to one of your infused items. You can do this once for free per long rest, or by expending a spell slot of 2nd level or higher.

archetypes.name: Artillerist
archetypes.previewtext: Specializes in using magic to create explosions and defensive positions, as well as magic-infused sidearms.

3.featuretextwithbullet: Tools of the Trade: You gain profiency with smith's tools and the woodcarver's tools, and aquire them for free. You may use rods, staffs, and wands as a spellcasting focus, and gain a non-magical wand for free. Also, crafting a magic item in the wand category takes a quarter of the normal time and costs half as much of the usual gold.
Arcane Turret: You learn how to create a magical turret. See the rulebook for details.

6.featuretextwithbullet: Wand Prototype: When finishing a long rest you can infuse a wand with any artificer cantrip that has a casting time of 1 action. Add you intelligence modifier to any damage roll made with this cantrip.

14.featuretextwithbullet: Fortified Position: You and your allies have half-cover while within 10 feet of your turrets. Also, you can summon a second turret of a different type, and can control with with a single bonus action.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Wand Prototype: When finishing a long rest you can infuse a wand with any two artificer cantrips that have a casting time of 1 action. Add you intelligence modifier to any damage roll made with these cantrip.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Wand Prototype: When finishing a long rest you can infuse a wand with any artificer cantrip that has a casting time of 1 action. Add you intelligence modifier to any damage roll made with this cantrip.

archetypes.name: Battle Smith
archetypes.previewtext: aAn expert at defending others and repairing both materiel and personnel

3.featuretextwithbullet: Tools of the Trade: You gain profiency with leatherworker's tools and smith's tools, and aquire them for free. Also, crafting a magic item in the armor category takes a quarter of the normal time and costs half as much of the usual gold.
Arcane Turret: The tinkering in your free time has borne you a faithful companion, an iron defender. See the rulebook for details.

6.featuretextwithbullet: Arcane Jolt: Your iron defender's bite attack is now considered magical. Also, once per turn when you or your iron defender hit a target with a magical weapon, you can choose to deal 2d4 extra force damage or heal one target within 30 feet 2d4 hit points. You can do this a number of times equal to your intelligence modifier per long rest.

14.featuretextwithbullet: Improved Defender: The extra damage and healing from Arcane Jolt increases to 4d4. Also, your iron defender deals 1d4 + your intelligence modifier when using Defensive Pounce.

replacestringfromfeaturetext.replacementtext: Arcane Jolt: Your iron defender's bite attack is now considered magical. Also, once per turn when you or your iron defender hit a target with a magical weapon, you can choose to deal 4d4 extra force damage or heal one target within 30 feet 4d4 hit points. You can do this a number of times equal to your intelligence modifier per long rest.
replacestringfromfeaturetext.find: Arcane Jolt: Your iron defender's bite attack is now considered magical. Also, once per turn when you or your iron defender hit a target with a magical weapon, you can choose to deal 2d4 extra force damage or heal one target within 30 feet 2d4 hit points. You can do this a number of times equal to your intelligence modifier per long rest.

entries.name: Boots of the Winding Path
entries.previewtext: Teleport to a recently traveled space

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Boots of the Winding Path (Item: a pair of boots; Requires attunment) - While wearing these boots, a creature can teleport up to 15 feet as a bonus action to an unoccupied space the creature can see. The creature must have occupied that space at some point during the current turn.

entries.name: Enhanced Defense
entries.previewtext: Increased AC while wearing the infused item

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Enhanced Defense (Item: a suit of armor or a shield) - A creature gains a +1 bonus to Armor Class while wearing (armor) or wielding (shield) the infused item. The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 12th level in this class.

entries.name: Enhanced Wand
entries.previewtext: +1 bonus to spell attack rolls, and ingore half cover

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Enhanced Wand (Item: a wand; Requires attunment) - While holding this wand, a creature gains a +1 bonus to spell attack rolls. In addition, the creature ignores half cover when making a spell attack. The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 12th level in this class.

entries.name: Enhanced Weapon
entries.previewtext: +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Enhanced Weapon (Item: a simple or martial weapon) - This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it. The bonus increases to +2 when you reach 12th level in this class.

entries.name: Many-Handed Pouch
entries.previewtext: Pouches that share an interdimensional space

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Many-Handed Pouch (Item: 2-5 pouches) - The infused pouches all share one interdimensional space of the same capacity as a single pouch. Thus, reaching into any of the pouches allows access to the same storage space. A pouch operates as long as it is within 100 miles of another one of the pouches; the pouch is otherwise empty and won't accept any contents. If this infusion ends, the items stored in the shared space move into one of the pouches, determined at random. The rest of the pouches become empty.

entries.name: Radiant Weapon
entries.previewtext: A magical weapon imbued with radiant energy

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Radiant Weapon (Item: weapon; Requires attunment) - Grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with this weapon. As a bonus action, the wielder can cause it to shed bright light in a 30ft radius and dim light for an additional 30ft, and can extinguish it as a bonus action. Once per rest as a reaction immediately after being hit by a melee attack, the wielder can cause the attacker to be blinded until the end of the attacker's next turn, unless the attacker succeeds on a Constitution saving throw against your spell save DC.

Replicate Magic Item (Item: varies; May require attunment) - When you learn this infusion, choose a magic item from the Replicable Magic Items table. You gain the ability to infuse a  mundane item to become your chosen magical item.

entries.name: Repulsion Shield
entries.previewtext: A magical shield that can push away attackers

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Repulsion Shield (Item: a shield; Requires attunment) - A creature gains a +1 bonus to AC while wielding this shield. Once per rest after being hit by a melee attack, the weilder can use a reaction to push the attacker up to 15ft away.

entries.name: Resistant Armor
entries.previewtext: A suit of armor that is resistant to a specific damage  type

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Resistant Armor (Item: a suite of armor; Requires attunment) - While wearing this armor, a creature has resistance to one of the following damage types, which you choose when you infuse the item: acid, cold, fire, force, lightning, necrotic, poison, psychic, radiant, or thunder.

entries.name: Returning Weapon
entries.previewtext: A weapon that returns when thrown

effects.featuretextwithbullet: Returning Weapon Item (Item: a weapon with the thrown property) - This magic weapon grants a +1 bonus to attack and damage rolls made with it, and it returns to the wielder's hand immediately after it is used to make a ranged attack.
